name: Six Eyes Weeping
description:
For #minijam76 - stop the crying, stop the dying.

Use the ARROW KEYS to move. Use the UP ARROW to enter doors and maintain conversations.

Extremely unfinished, unpolished, no true end-state, none of the planned dungeons, tons of missing pixel chunks.. but here's my jam submission all the same! I'll be back later to add all of what's missing - ie, the game bit.

SPECIAL THANKS
Tofu, for the palette,
Sean, for the hacks,
and Adam, for Bitsy.

Thank you for playing ♥
